context.b: Configure a Social Account for Twitter
context.p: To configure a social account for Twitter:

ol.li: Navigate to the Social Accounts section under Network Settings.
Click Login with Twitter under Twitter Accounts. A dialog box pops up to allow you to authorize the Livefyre Social Curation app.
Log into a Twitter account or create a new account.
Add a Display Name for the account, then click Save Settings. Click on Social Account in the header of the account info box to collapse the account.
